The dimensions of the final shape are as follows: * Length: 0.75 units (0.6074 x 2 for part 2) * Width: 0.75 units (0.6074 x 2 for part 2) * Height: 0.4482 units (0.2344 for part 1 and 0.1138 for part 2)</description>
